seo.name: What to Watch ?
seo.title: Personalized Movie Recommendations
seo.description: Discover movies that match your mood on your favorite platforms. Find your next favorite movie in just a few clicks with What to Watch!

auth.login: Login - Access Your Personalized Movie Recommendations
auth.signup: Sign Up - Join the Movie Enthusiast Community

auth.login: Log in to access tailored movie recommendations. Continue your cinematic journey now!
auth.signup: Create a free account and receive movie suggestions that match your taste. Join our community of movie lovers!
auth.forgot-password: Easily recover access to your What to Watch account. Follow our secure process to reset your password.
auth.update-password: Enhance the security of your What to Watch account. Update your password for a smoother recommendation experience.

descriptions.profile: Refine your preferences, manage your history and favorites. Rate and comment for even more personalized movie recommendations.
